features_verified: Event handling (QUIT, ESC key, R key for restart)
Player entity with movement (LEFT/RIGHT arrows) and jump (SPACE)
Koopa enemy spawning from both sides
Shell physics and chain reaction mechanics
Game over state and restart functionality

mechanics_verified: Player: Movement with arrow keys, jump with space
Koopa: Walking enemies that bounce off screen edges
Stomp: Jumping on Koopa transforms it into stationary shell
Kick: Touching stationary shell launches it as projectile
Chain reaction: Moving shell kills other Koopas with exponential scoring
Game over conditions: Collision with walking Koopa or moving shell

graphics.details: Vector-based graphics using pygame.draw primitives (rect, ellipse, circle, line)

conclusion: The application successfully starts, initializes all game systems, and implements the described game mechanics. The basic functionality works as specified in appinfo.json.
